data.comment: The match is underway in Southampton.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Southampton.
In the minute 2, Throw-in Southampton.
Mike Dean signals a Southampton throw-in in Man City's half.
Can Man City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Southampton's half?
In the minute 5, Moussa Djenepo (Southampton) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Southampton have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Man City.
In the minute 7, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Man City in their own half.
Man City to take a throw-in in Southampton territory.
In the minute 11, Raheem Sterling of Man City gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Southampton goal kick.
Kevin De Bruyne (Man City) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 12, Corner awarded to Man City.
Man City push forward at St. Mary's Stadium and Ilkay Gundogan gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Southampton defence.
Corner awarded to Man City.
In the minute 13, Man City's Joao Cancelo gets in a shot on goal at St. Mary's Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Man City have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Throw-in high up the field for Man City in Southampton.
In the minute 14, Mike Dean signals a free kick to Man City.
Mike Dean blows against Man City's Raheem Sterling for offside.
Raheem Sterling is on target to give Man City a 0-1 advantage.
In the minute 16, Kevin De Bruyne with an assist there.
Throw-in for Man City in their own half.
Southampton drive upfield and Danny Ings gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Man City defender.
In the minute 21, Southampton pushes forward through Theo Walcott, whose finish on goal is saved.
Oriol Romeu (Southampton) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick Southampton.
In the minute 24, Man City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Southampton in their own half.
At St. Mary's Stadium, Kevin De Bruyne has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Southampton's Ryan Bertrand is back in action after a slight knock.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 26, Southampton's Moussa Djenepo is whistled for offside at St. Mary's Stadium.
In the minute 26, Ryan Bertrand is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In Southampton Southampton attack through Danny Ings. The finish is off target, however.
Mike Dean awards Man City a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Southampton have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Jannik Vestergaard (Southampton) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Throw-in for Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Man City in the half of Southampton.
Southampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mike Dean awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 33, Mike Dean signals a free kick to Man City in their own half.
Can Man City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Southampton's half?
Corner awarded to Southampton.
In the minute 35, Southampton attack but Jannik Vestergaard's header doesn't find the target.
Man City have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Man City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 38, Southampton will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Man City.
Free kick for Man City in the half of Southampton.
Oriol Romeu (Southampton) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 39, Mike Dean signals a Man City throw-in in Southampton's half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Danny Ings for Southampton who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Ralph Hasenhuttl (Southampton) is making a first change, with Nathan Tella replacing the possibly injured Danny Ings.
In the minute 42, In Southampton a free kick has been awarded the away team.
James Ward-Prowse is booked for the home team.
Corner awarded to Southampton.
In the minute 45, Free kick Southampton.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Man City to take a throw-in in Southampton territory.
In the minute 45, Mike Dean signals a Man City throw-in in Southampton's half.
The first half has been concluded at St. Mary's Stadium.
The second-half is underway in Southampton.
In the minute 46, Southampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 47, Man City's Ferran Torres gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
Mike Dean awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Man City in their own half.
Throw-in Southampton.
Throw-in for Man City in the half of Southampton.
In the minute 52, Man City needs to be cautious. Southampton have an attacking throw-in.
Nathan Tella for the home team is judged to be offside.
Man City's Bernardo Silva is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 57, Man City have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Nathan Redmond is replacing Moussa Djenepo for the home team.
Corner awarded to Southampton.
In the minute 59, Southampton have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Southampton.
Mike Dean awards Man City a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Nathan Redmond for Southampton drives towards goal at St. Mary's Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Important block from the Man City defence as Nathan Redmond fires in a strike for Southampton.
Ball safe as Man City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 65, Southampton are pushing forward but Oriol Romeu's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Man City at St. Mary's Stadium.
Man City awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
Free kick for Southampton in the half of Man City.
Mike Dean signals a throw-in for Southampton, close to Man City's area.
In the minute 70, Kevin De Bruyne gets his shot on target but fails to score for Man City.
Ball safe as Man City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Riyad Mahrez is on a sub for Ferran Torres for Man City.
In the minute 73, Southampton's Che Adams attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Southampton.
Can Southampton capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Man City's half?
In the minute 76, Man City have a goal kick.
Southampton have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Man City in their own half.
In the minute 78, Ilkay Gundogan of Man City smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Man City have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Ball goes out of play for a Southampton goal kick.
In the minute 80, Man City awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Southampton Southampton's Theo Walcott is caught offside.
In Southampton a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man City's half?
Southampton make their third substitution with Daniel N`Lundulu replacing Che Adams.
In the minute 81, Ederson (Man City) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 82, Kyle Walker is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Southampton in their own half.
Kyle Walker is back on the pitch.
In the minute 85, Southampton are in shooting range from this free kick.
Free kick for Man City in their own half.
Riyad Mahrez of Man City is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 87, Man City to take a throw-in in Southampton territory.
Throw-in for Man City close to the penalty box.
Man City have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 89, In Southampton a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Southampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mike Dean awards the away team a throw-in.
Man City's Riyad Mahrez breaks free at St. Mary's Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Mike Dean awards Southampton a goal kick.
Raheem Sterling for Man City gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Southampton goal kick.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Southampton in their own half.
At St. Mary's Stadium the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Man City.
Throw-in for Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
The match is over. Final score 0-1.
